alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY AND SOUTHERN DEARBORN COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Milan, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Rising Sun, Versailles, Milan, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, Manchester, French, Sunman, Hartford, Mount Sinai, Pate, Cold Springs, Farmers Retreat, Friendship and Versailles Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
